summary: "EastEnders," a popular British TV soap opera on BBC One since 1985, is set in the made-up London area of Walford. It tells stories about local people and their families. The show has been very successful, with some episodes reaching the top 10 most-watched in the UK. It's known for tackling tough subjects and showing a side of British life rarely seen on TV. The show is filmed at BBC Elstree and has featured strong families like the Watts, Mitchells, and Slaters. Recently, the set was rebuilt to improve the filming experience. While "EastEnders" has faced criticism for some storylines, it's also been praised for addressing real-life issues.
title: EastEnders
